attributes.action: Only pay child benefit for the first 5 children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that if child benefit was limited to the first 5 children ( excluding multiple births) then there would be less people remaining on state benefits , and more people would have to work to provide for their families. If people want large families , this may hopefully make people think twice about whether they can afford them.
